page.description: The FILE.TO_STRING() method reads a file from disk into a text variable, Data.

argument.name: Filename
argument.description: The full path specification of the file.

return.name: Data
return.description: Returns the data in the file.

page.example: dim cc as C cc = FILE.to_string("C:\Frame.Txt") ? len(cc) = 1777.000000
